clearplot
hold on
t = 0:0.01:20;
y = -8 * exp(-t) -10*t + 2008;
plot(t, y, 'b')
plot([0.0, 0.5, 1.0, 1.5, 2.0, 2.5, 3.0, 3.5, 4.0, 4.5, 5.0, 5.5, 6.0, 6.5, 7.0, 7.5, 8.0, 8.5, 9.0, 9.5, 10.0, 10.5, 11.0, 11.5, 12.0, 12.5, 13.0, 13.5, 14.0, 14.5, 15.0, 15.5, 16.0, 16.5, 17.0, 17.5, 18.0, 18.5, 19.0, 19.5, 20.0], [2000.0, 1999.0, 1996.4166666666667, 1992.5633919170364, 1988.2724226357243, 1983.7093315411398, 1978.9776490518434, 1974.142494895282, 1969.2438378062182, 1964.3061390801415, 1959.3444344375903, 1954.3679737464563, 1949.3824431733506, 1944.3913374362546, 1939.3968046592688, 1934.400165309394, 1929.4022310706462, 1924.4035008756512, 1919.4042814133593, 1914.4047612028426, 1909.4050561251129, 1904.4052374111754, 1899.4053488460845, 1894.4054173441189, 1889.4054594492434, 1884.405485330884, 1879.4055012400952, 1874.405511019344, 1869.40551703056, 1864.4055207256004, 1859.4055229969083, 1854.405524393061, 1849.4055252512633, 1844.4055257787925, 1839.40552610306, 1834.4055263023845, 1829.4055264249073, 1824.405526500221, 1819.4055265465156, 1814.4055265749726, 1809.4055265924649], 'r')
